sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_5f8feff0dbe5b20062e479daae9619fc
sys_update_xml.payload: c$pe-theme-color: #283347 !default; $pe-theme-background-color: #1c2432 !default; $pe-text-color: #fff !default; $pe-sub-text-color: #68acd8 !default; $pe-status-color-normal: #29bd00 !default; .people-card-flyout { .badge { border-radius: 100px; float: right; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; height: 28px; margin-top: -5px; padding-top: 7px; } .photo { img { height: 40px; width: 40px; } &:after { background-color: $pe-status-color-normal; border-radius: 50%; content: ''; height: 10px; left: 80%; position: absolute; top: 78%; width: 10px; } } color: $pe-text-color; .panel { border: 0; color: $pe-text-color; background-color: transparent; .panel-heading { border-bottom: 0 !important; background-color: $pe-theme-color !important; color: $pe-text-color !important; font-size: 12px; padding: 14px; text-transform: uppercase; } .panel-body { background-color: $pe-theme-background-color; color: $pe-text-color; h4 { font-size: 24px; margin-top: -5px !important; } .user-sub-text { color: $pe-sub-text-color; font-size: 12px; margin-bottom: -5px; margin-top: -5px; } .sub-text { color: $pe-sub-text-color; font-size: 10px; margin: -5px 0 -5px 0; text-transform: uppercase; } } .panel-vips { .panel-heading { background-color: #394b6b !important; padding-bottom: 15px; } .star-ribbon { margin-right: 16px; } .lower-case { margin-left: -2px; } .badge { background-color: $pe-theme-color; width: 76px; } .user-sub-text { margin-top: -10px; } .row { margin-bottom: 30px; &:first-child { margin-top: 5px; } &:last-child { margin-bottom: 5px; } } } } .header-left-icon { margin: 0 0 7px 11%;
